text: Mads Dittmann Mikkelsen (born 22 November 1965) is a Danish actor. He is best known for his roles in the movies King Arthur (2004), Casino Royale (2006), Coco Chanel & Igor Stravinsky (2009), The Hunt (2012) and Doctor Strange and Rogue One (both 2016). He also played Hannibal Lecter in the NBC television series Hannibal (2013–2015). Mikkelsen was born in Østerbro, Copenhagen. His older brother, Lars, is also an actor. He married Hanne Jacobsen in 2000. The couple have two children. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Actors who played Bond villains Category:Danish movie actors Category:Danish television actors Category:Actors from Copenhagen Category:Voice actors
title: Mads Mikkelsen
